fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: Play one of your many instruments.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: The piano will make you immune to voting the next day, usable once. The snare drum will reveal someone's role the first time it is used on someone, it will attack them the second time. The trumpet will wake everyone up early, roleblocking half of all players, which is dependent on whose abilities get processed first. The flute will stop all visits on a target.
